name: gravimetrically

done by measuring the weight of a substance: The subsample was oven dried to determine soil moisture gravimetrically. Water content was determined gravimetrically.
done by measuring the gravitational force of something (= the force that attracts objects towards one another): Hydraulic measurements were determined gravimetrically - the height of the water source was recorded to determine the water gradient pressure.
More examplesFewer examplesSoil moisture was determined gravimetrically and expressed as grams of water per unit mass of dry soil.Moisture holding capacity was analysed gravimetrically.The total gas released was determined gravimetrically using a precision scale.
